document_data.name: Cinderhild
document_data.mainbody: '''Cinderhild''' was a [[fire giant]] and the belligerent daughter of Duke [[Zalto]] in [[Ironslag]] sometime after the [[War of the Silver Marches]].
document_data.History:
In the late 1480s or early 1490s DR, Cinderhild lived in her and her brother's room with two [[hobgoblin]] handmaidens.

Cinderhild was secretly planning to escape from the forge in order to see the world.
document_data.Personality: Her father told Cinderhild that Toril was full of wonders but gave her no permission to leave and thus she was angry with Zalto. She had a low opinion of her brother.
